nodes.text: This arachnid lived on the Forest Moon of Endor. It had four purple limbs with claws and a body divided into a head, thorax, and abdomen. The creature had blue fur with tufts of purple and markings of yellow on its back. The arachnid had four sharp fangs it its mouth and two yellow eyes. This animal inhabited an area of Endor near the Cavern of Broken Dreams. It spun a web across the nearby chasm and had the ability to launch gobs of webbing from its mouth.

One of these creatures once tried to capture the Ewok Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka. She had come to the Cavern of Broken Dreams to coax out her friend, Wicket Wystri Warrick, who was sulking inside. The arachnid came from the cave and tried to catch the Ewok, a task in which it was aided by the mischievous meddling of a lucksprite. Although the lucksprite's machinations caused Warrick and Kneesaa to nearly be eaten by the arachnid, they triumphed over it, sending it plummeting to its doom in the chasm by destroying its web with a stone.
